Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.commons.validators

Interface Validator

All Known Implementing Classes:
AssetCategoryValidator, KvAttributeValidator, LocationValidator, ParameterValidator, ParameterValueValidator, SystemValidator, VendorValidator
public interface Validator
This interface defines methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules. Validators might check for mandatory fields without values, relationships with other entities, invalid field formats etc. Implementations take place on the persistence layer.
Since:
version 0.3.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]

  • Method Details

    • validateAttributes

      ResponseWrapper validateAttributes(RequestDto requestDto) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method triggers validation of the data transfer object's attributes.
      Parameters:
      requestDto - A data transfer object to validate, not null.
      Returns:
      An abstract ResponseWrapper (the user will receive a more elaborate one, here it is used only for internal intra-module communication). throws IllegalArgumentException, if requestDto is null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      Returns:
      An abstract ResponseWrapper (the user will receive a more elaborate one, here it is used only for internal intra-module communication). throws IllegalArgumentException, if requestDto is null.
